mapper.select: SELECT SUM(ISNULL(INFLUENCE_SCORE, 0)) FROM FUN_USER_SCORE_RECORD WHERE COMP_ID = #{compId} AND CITY_ID = #{cityId} AND ARCHIVE_ID = #{archiveId} AND CREATE_TIME >= #{currentMonthTime}

SELECT ARCHIVE_ID archiveId ,ISNULL(SUM (INFLUENCE_SCORE), 0) scoreCount from FUN_USER_SCORE_RECORD WHERE CITY_ID = #{cityId} AND COMP_ID =#{compId} AND CREATE_TIME >=#{startTime} AND ${rangeColumn} IN (${rangeIds}) GROUP BY ARCHIVE_ID
